Description:
Presales Solutions Architect - Cyber Security ServicesAs a vital member of the sales team, the Pre-Sales Security Architect - Cyber Security has the responsibility of complex information security solution development, sales strategy, project transition to account managers, providing feedback to marketing, and regional leadership. Successful candidates should exhibit a deep understanding of the security industry and the ability to highlight the value of managed security services. Key tasks include:Developing solutions and conducting compelling proof of concept demonstrations.
Ensuring that solutions in the Statement of Work align with best practices and client needs.
Demonstrating strong business and technical acumen.
Effective communication across client organizations, including executives, stakeholders, and delivery teams.
Serving as a subject matter expert on Kalaam Cyber Security services and offerings, fostering trust through strategic thought, execution, and technical expertise.ResponsibilitiesGathering business requirements from customers in collaboration with the sales team.
Understanding and responding to RFPs/RFIs to prepare technical responses.
Providing suitable solutions to customers and creating BOQs.
Having vendor product knowledge of various security solutions.
Delivering solution presentations to C-level executives.
Ensuring solution quality and consistency, and advising clients on cloud-based and managed security services.
Acting as a subject matter expert for commercial security platforms.
Collaborating with partners to develop comprehensive security service offerings.
Designing technical solutions for compliance and governance objectives.
Consulting with CSOs/CISOs on security solution selection.
Developing proposals consistent with customer risk management goals.
Providing training and sales materials to Sales Account Managers.
Crafting Service Level Agreements for designated services.
Working closely with vendors and partners to meet customer requirements.
Contributing to whitepapers, articles, and blogs.
Conducting internal training sessions.
Assisting delivery teams with knowledge transfer.Skills
